title: Illuminated Infant
description: Oil painting of a baby, exploring colors and light, inspired by impressionists. I was trying out some water based oil colors, wet on wet. Not my usual medium of choice and the only oil painting in here.

title: Baptism on Water
description: Watercolor baptism scene, an exploration into religious themes. Inspired by croquis method of drawing, using light watercolors & ink, and drawing quickly to capture a scene.

title: Proboscis Umbra
description: Drawing from a series of mask variations, usually following an insect, or similar impression. Charcoal on rough paper.

title: Cloak in Motion
description: One is a series of darkroom photographs experimenting with various light exposure settings during development, as well as capturing motion in the subject.

title: Untitled Game Asset: Conch Enemy
description: Enemy design for an unreleased shoot-em-up game prototype. Will move in a sine wave pattern and shoot laser beams at your ship. Its laser would span the width of the screen, forcing the player to take evasive action.

title: Post: Concept Cover
description: Cover for a conceptual comic book called Post. A post apocalyptic desert adventure with heavy religious themes.

title: Stark Dunes
description: Windswept, stark sand dunes. Ink on semi-transparent paper and rice paper backing. One of several landscapes of this style, trying to capture the life, yet lifelessness of the desert.

title: Proboscis Canus
description: Insect inspired, hunched wandering figure. Part of a series of mask drawings and paintings exploring similar themes. Pencil on paper.

title: Untitled Game: Ship Explosion
description: Ship explosion design for an unreleased shoot-em-up game prototype. It was meant as the player death explosion, as you're controlling a spaceship. Inspired by Metal Slug explosion style.

title: Untitled Game: Floating Island
description: A floating island for an unreleased shoot-em-up game prototype. Would bob slightly up and down, impeding the player.

title: Development fluid experiment
description: Painting with development fluid on light sensitive paper. Hard to control the result, along with exposure to light, turned out interesting though

title: Goat Boys LP Cover Design
description: Cover design for Goat Boys debut album. Vector design inspired by Chinese theater masks.

title: Canus Fratr
description: Pencil sketch of a proboscis gass mask. Part of a larger series of mask explorations.

title: Hooded Moon
description: Album cover draft for an electronica band. It was not used, but I still like how it turned out. Would need additional work, and is considered unfinished.

title: Proboscis Bibo
description: Mixed medium, marker and ink on rice paper, done quickly with a more cartoonish style.

title: Self Portrait: Gesture
description: Self portrait gesturing, using ink on plastic paper. Part of a series of self portriaits done in this style.

title: Proboscis Plicatus
description: One in a series of insect-like mask wearing figures. Was originally part of a website design, make sure to advance the image to the next one to see the version it would transform into

title: Midsummer 1
description: Part of the midsummer photo series developed in a darkroom. Later weathered and lightly painted.

title: Midsummer 2
description: Part of the midsummer photo series developed in a darkroom. Later weathered and lightly painted.

title: Midsummer 3
description: Part of the midsummer photo series developed in a darkroom. Later weathered and lightly painted.

title: Midsummer 4
description: Part of the midsummer photo series developed in a darkroom. Later weathered and lightly painted.

title: Post: Desert Dweller
description: Partial drawing of a desert dweller, part of the Post conceptual comic. Never finished this, but I still like it

title: Monoxi Player: idle animation
description: Idle animation player character sprite for an unreleased game prototype

title: Monoxie Player: jump animation
description: Jump animation player character sprite for unreleased game prototype

title: Monoxie Player: running animation
description: Running animation player character sprite for unreleased game prototype

title: Ink Character
description: Inked character in a rough style. Ink on paper.

title: Proboscis Ingens
description: Ink drawing of a insect like masked figure. Part of a series of mask drawings and paintings exploring similar themes.

title: Post: Angle
description: Character for a conceptual comic book called Post. A post apocalyptic desert adventure with heavy religious themes. Its based on the same mask design as previous sketches, but attempting a more lowered view angle.

title: Post: Equipped
description: Character for a conceptual comic book called Post. A post apocalyptic desert adventure with heavy religious themes. Attempting to visualize an equipped character. Ink on plastic paper, with a rice paper backing.

title: Pattern Composition
description: Ornamental pattern drawing, scaled and mirrored. Scan quality is not great, but I like the nouveau inspiration.

title: Pray Pencil
description: Two praying figures in the desert. Pencil on paper. Weathered later and adjusted color balance. Part of a larger exploration of religious themes.

title: Domestic Gardening
description: Several logo drafts for a gardening company. These were rejected, but I still like them.

title: Salt Dunes
description: Sand dunes dunes abstracted. Drawn with ink & marker on rice paper.

title: Post: Underground Dweller
description: Mask study, part of a conceptual comic book. A post apocalyptic desert adventure with heavy religious themes.

title: Untitled Game: Screenshot
description: Screenshot from an unreleased shoot-em-up game prototype. Game was in very early stages, so some post composition is done to give a full impression.

title: Sea of Sand
description: Desert landscape, where the sand compacted almost looks like the sea. Ink on plastic transparent paper, with a backing of weathered rice paper.

title: Proboscis Color
description: Watercolor & marker. Drawing of a kneeling masked person. Part of a series of mask drawings and paintings exploring similar themes. Drawn on very cheap paper, so I was never able to get it fully flat when scanning.

title: Stones Study
description: A study of stone texture. The best result of a session creating stone textures using dry brush on water color paper.

title: Post: Thirst
description: Person arriving after wandering the desert for to long, captured when he takes his first drink when arriving at the settlement. Ink on rice paper. Part of the Post series of comic book sketches.

title: Post: The Three Men
description: Three desert dwellers passing the time by playing card. Large emphasis on shadow and play of light. Ink on rice paper. Part of a conceptual comic book. A post apocalyptic desert adventure with heavy religious themes.

title: VLN Cover Draft
description: Pixel art draft for an album cover. Not used but I got to explore text from that perspective, general pixel art texturing, and light.

title: Wind Album Cover
description: Cover for a 60s inspired jam band. Taking heavy inspiration from other illustrations from the era of the bands style, and Art Nouveau. Marker on paper. Later adjusted for color balance, and mirrored certain sections in the border.

title: Cloth Study
description: A study in cloth folds, and how to draw that realistically. The body and hands were an afterthought and was not worked on beyond a simple sketch.

title: Paxel
description: Pixel art stylized gassmask used for a new tab/start page project.

title: Self Portrait: Noir
description: Banner image for a previous gallery webpage called noir. Parts drawn separately, composed together later. Ink and marker on plastic paper.

title: Drainpipes
description: Drainpipe macro shot, developed in darkroom. Experimenting with printing light exposure when developing. Subject is some drainpipes I was next to one day, but I think as an abstract piece it works.

title: Portrait: Per
description: Portrait painted as part of a celebration, only captured with poor camera, will update when I get the chance. Ink on plastic paper

title: Baphomet
description: A very large pixel art skeleton featuring a plague mask. I no longer remember what spurred on this creation, but it was supposed to be part of something, originally never finished it. Came back later for finishing touches.

title: Datorder: Logo Draft
description: Part of a series of logo designs for a order management platform. Was supposed to evoke a feeling of order, and a focus on whatever item passed through the system. Multiple palette versions were made of this.

title: Untitled Game Asset: Cliff
description: Landscape asset from an unreleased, untitled shoot-em-up game prototype. Part of a larger tileset for the first work.

title: Lamp Noir
description: A lamp face design, made to look like a glass painting. Cut with a laser cutter and cutouts painted in various colors, illuminated with a light. The implementation was poor but the pattern turned out great.

title: Datorder: Eight
description: One of the logo designs I made for an order management platform. The eight had a symboling meaning for the founders.

title: Find in Files (fif)
description: Logo design for a program I made searching for text in files using fuzzy matching. Later used for various things, I've used it as an avatar and as a logo for this gallery.

title: Herb
description: Logo design made for a programming library for CSS styling web pages. Repository has been archived, but it's still available in it's current state. I was unable to keep maintaining it, was a lot harder when I didn't actively used it due to employment and priority changes.

title: Monoxie Vector Experiment
description: Messing around in inkscpe. An attempt at making vector looking less "slick", turned out instresting.

title: Morning Fog
description: Picture taken during my morning commute, I like the foggy almost liminal feel of it.

title: Srcery Logo
description: Logo for a colorscheme I made, for various editors. Meant to invoke a certain occult vibe. The colors in the logo are the ones from the color scheme.

title: Tincture
description: Logo design made for a programming library for CSS styling toolkit. It is a collection of various thing I used on a regular basis at work. Repository has been archived, but it's still available in it's current state. I was unable to keep maintaining it, was a lot harder when I didn't actively used it due to employment and priority changes.
